name: Comic 5trike
storyline: 5 Kids during a short trip to get Ice Cream find a weird automaton robot that upon noticing one of them kids' weird physique and composition calls upon a horde of robots making them run into the woods afraid, leading to them being surprised by a giant meteor crashing nearby them, leaving them apparently unharmed but disabling all the robots. But things go weird as they start noticing their bodies start to burn form the inside as they slowly but surely start showing their new super powers granted by some weird spherical spectral beings that start following them, letting them know taht there are many more of them and now it is their task to save them all and the world from the clutches of the maker of those pesky robots and find out what is the connection in between the robots and the alien beings that granted them super powers.
summary:
Save the world using superpowers while fighting hordes of enemies with your friends!

5 friends get themselves tangled in a fight against a crazy doctor, a girl that can control black holes, and hordes of robots hunting for the same beings that gave the kids their superpowers.
